comment: Looks so cool!

author: Gerry Minetos
comment: Currently my favorite watch face. A little light on the functionality maybe but  animated visual design is very Ghost in the Shell.

author: Robert Slack
comment: Excellent

author: Chris Winter
comment: Only wish is more interactive widgets. Touching date would open calendar or clock face would opn the alram setting. Awesone looking face.
title: Great looking

author: Amaro
comment: The developer is dedicated and works to keep his watch faces up to date. Like very much the design of his work and features of the watch face.
title: Great watch face and support

author: Carl Fowles
comment: Looks the nuts!
title: Hi-tech

author: Blake Tabackman
comment: Looks great on Huawei Watch!
title: Awesome

author: Crawford Hollis
comment: Very nice
title: Nice

author: Faisal Mohiuddin
comment: Battery consuming

author: Angel R
comment: It's futuristic, but not cheesy. This watch face is done well. It provides you with good options for the widgets. The ability to change the font would be nice. Quick tip for future installers: editing the face can be done through the Android Wear app. This isn't a standalone app. After some use I noticed that the command responsiveness may cause it to crash/seriously lag: "ok Google" & other voice recognition.
title: Cool, futuristic design, but...

author: Mitchel Wood
comment: So far I like it. The animations are cool, yet minimal, which should (in theory) help preserve battery. The only thing I dislike is the font (especially the 7s that look like backwards Fs) Any chance for a font choice?
title: Like it so far

author: Dylan Yaga
comment: I am always looking for futuristic looking watch faces. I found several from this developer! They include simple setup (which is always a plus for a watch face) but many options within it. Easy on the watch battery too! Could not ask for more! The developer responds very quickly to inquiries as well, and is very helpful with troubleshooting.
title: Awesome face!

author: H D
comment: It looks jagged on my LG G Watch R.  Disappointed because it came close to what I wanted: full information all the time.  Also,  it is a shame that there is no step counter and no barometric pressure indicator.  Also,  no HR monitor or at least a shortcut to the one already included in Android wear.  I will update my rating if graphics will be fixed.
title: Looks aliased (jagged)

author: Jorge Coelho
comment: Futuristic and has lots of info widgets. Even has full color ambient mode. Looks great on LG Urbane.
title: Very futuristic

author: Bryan Guerrero
comment: The watchface is really nice and the animations are super smooth!
title: Great Watchface

author: David Traumann
comment: Nice watchface with the best battery I've seen on a watchface so far. Even with heart rate monitor and weather updates I can easily make it through an 18 hours day (Moto 360 5.1.1). Would like to have an option to make the clock and widgets a little bigger than they are on the large settings. Also turning off the widget background when widget is turned off.
title: Needs more options

author: Michael Lounsbury
comment: Really like the look but not being able to change the color of the watch battery indicator is a shame

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
Hi.
Thank you, I'll add an option for that. Please send me an email, I'll keep you updated :)

title: Nice but battery indicator

author: Pubudu Tippalagama
comment: this is a nice watchface but..it looks jagged on my G watch R... please fix this issue....many thanks i will update the rating afterward

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
Hi,
Can you send me more details by email (option used, description) ? and maybe a screenshot ? It will help me to understand the problem.

author: col Richardson
comment: Great. Works very well good in sunlight and a better battery consumer than others in its class.
title: By this facility watch face

author: Adam Lalani
comment: Battery life is awesome

author: Tyson Nielsen
comment: Please add a brightness control for ambient mode. My watch is at the lowest brightness and in ambient mode the watch is waaay too bright. Please add this option and I will boost to 5 stars in a heartbeat!
title: Almost perfect but needs 1 thing

author: Ryan Bush
comment: Keep up the great work.  I was wondering if you could add the fuel gage style battery level for mobile opposite of watch battery? That way it would free up the three small gages for other stuff.
title: Great design.

author: Kevin Verdesca
comment: This is truly a great watch face! The only thing that should be changed is the watch battery is always orange instead of changing with the primary or secondary colors. So far this watch face has been great on battery as well!
title: Awesome

author: Kyle Veatch
comment: Very nice watch face. Lots of customizable options. My only recommendations would be to be to adjust the time more (font, no seconds, more sizes) and name labels on colors. Thanks!
title: Very nice

author: Wayne Rasor
comment: Developer added 2 requested features within 24 hours! Amazing watch face and customer service!
title: Awesome, responsive developer!

author: Segun Odubanwo
comment: Dis app now works pretty well on my moto with good customization. U deserve 5 stars for a good job.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. I do not think it is linked to the watch face, because a watch face does not participate in the bluetooth transaction. Try to uninstall / reinstall Android Wear App on your mobile, maybe it will help to solve your problem.

title: Nice

author: Sen ectus
comment: Have it expand to fill the screen rather than squeeze it into the square one and I might be interested.

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
For the moment square watches will display as round watches do. I'll think about what I can do for sqaure, but it will be difficult to do an adapted design, due to the round oriented format.
Maybe I'll fill the corners with some materials, but I think the main part will remain the same.

title: Looks really ugly on a square screen

author: Art Holland
comment: Installs but not to be found on desktop nor where all the apps are when you wanna bring them up to the desktop. It is in settings/apps but all you can do is uninstall it. Tried twice with same results. Go figger.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: If you cannot see the watch face, please go to Android Wear Application, open Settings and use Re-sync apps option. If it does not work, please disconnect devices(watch and phone), uninstall the watch face, restart watch and connect device again. then finally install the watch face.

title: Installs but don't install
